channel.title: Talks on Scott Linder
channel.description: Recent content in Talks on Scott Linder

item.title: Git for the Uninitiated
item.description: A second talk covering the Git distributed version control system that I gave to the Computer Club of Western Michigan University in February 2015. Slide deck is available on GitHub.

item.title: Rust
item.description: A talk on the Rust programming language I gave to the Computer Club of Western Michigan University in October 2014.

item.title: Git or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Code
item.description: A talk I gave about the Git distributed version control system to the Computer Club at Western Michigan University in October 2014. Also a shallow reference to a great film.
